As Efficiency percentage lowers, all fab.message: Ȃƨ Ɛғғїϲїέƞϲу ⍴έȓϲέƞҭȃɠέ ⌊ȏῴέȓƨ, ȃ⌊⌊ ғȃББέȓƨ, ғȃϲҭȏȓїέƨ ȃƞɗ Ҫȏʍʍȃƞɗέȓƨ Бմї⌊ɗ ƨ⌊ȏῴέȓ
As Efficiency percentage lowers, all fab.original: As Efficiency percentage lowers, all fabbers, factories and Commanders build slower

Build Metal Storage and Energy Storage t.message: ฿մї⌊ɗ Μέҭȃ⌊ Ṡҭȏȓȃɠέ ȃƞɗ Ɛƞέȓɠу Ṡҭȏȓȃɠέ ҭȏ ƨҭȏϲќ⍴ї⌊έ ʍȏȓέ ȓέƨȏմȓϲέƨ
Build Metal Storage and Energy Storage t.original: Build Metal Storage and Energy Storage to stockpile more resources

Energy and Metal resources get consumed.message: Ɛƞέȓɠу ȃƞɗ Μέҭȃ⌊ ȓέƨȏմȓϲέƨ ɠέҭ ϲȏƞƨմʍέɗ ῴнї⌊έ Бմї⌊ɗїƞɠ
Energy and Metal resources get consumed.original: Energy and Metal resources get consumed while building

If you\u2019re consuming more than you a.message: Ϊғ уȏմ’ȓέ ϲȏƞƨմʍїƞɠ ʍȏȓέ ҭнȃƞ уȏմ ȃȓέ ⍴ȓȏɗմϲїƞɠ, Бմї⌊ɗ έғғїϲїέƞϲу ƨ⌊ȏῴƨ ɗȏῴƞ
If you\u2019re consuming more than you a.original: If you’re consuming more than you are producing, build efficiency slows down

To generate Energy, build Energy Plants.message: 丁ȏ ɠέƞέȓȃҭέ Ɛƞέȓɠу, Бմї⌊ɗ Ɛƞέȓɠу Ṕ⌊ȃƞҭƨ
To generate Energy, build Energy Plants.original: To generate Energy, build Energy Plants

To generate Metal, build Metal Extractor.message: 丁ȏ ɠέƞέȓȃҭέ Μέҭȃ⌊, Бմї⌊ɗ Μέҭȃ⌊ Ɛ⌧ҭȓȃϲҭȏȓƨ
To generate Metal, build Metal Extractor.original: To generate Metal, build Metal Extractors
